newsitem.title: USA: BAB Holdings director, founder resigns.
newsitem.headline: BAB Holdings director, founder resigns.

text.p: BAB Holdings Inc, which operates Big Apple Bagels, Brewster's Coffee, and My Favorite Muffin stores, said Paul Stolzer resigned as a board member.
Stolzer founded Big Apple Bagels store in 1986 in Naperville, Ill.. He will remain a major shareholder and consultant for the company.
The board is currently in the process of finding a suitable replacement with a food service background, the company said in a statement on Thursday.
BAB Holdings presently has 237 units in 29 states and Canada, including 30 company-owned stores.
